title: Champion of the Poro's Icon
body:
Just grinded out and got the champion of the poro's icon, which has a sweet looking Poro king in it. With all the poro icons in the store giving you custom poros in the game mode, I was super excited to get a mini poro king for my poro.

I got NOTHING, why Rito. All 5 icons you buy give you a cool poro, you can't give us one awesome one for free to hype the event?

Dont get me wrong the icon by itself is cool, but I was so keen for it ;(

replies.body: Hai {{champion:238}} Sup ummm i luv that icon its cool

I am annoyed as hell that you have to pay for temporary poro skins. Some of them should be unlockable, with the other half purchased. Or, at least, make half purchasable with IP... LIKE ICONS ARE 90% OF THE TIME.
I would've loved this aswell. I am still excited to get the icon but now that you say that you get nothing, my hype has died down.
We were a 5 premade and legit once we realised we had no Poro kings, we just afk'd and let them push to win haha, So hyped for it and then just major let down
